results.title: Throwing and catching
results.creator_credit: N.E. Sweglar and Visual Information Systems
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Lacrosse - the Fastest Game on Two Feet”
A coaching film concentrating on how one holds the lacrosse stick and the correct way to throw and catch the ball. Also shows exercises to help you and your team develop your skills.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Lacrosse - the Fastest Game on Two Feet”.
One of a series of films which demonstrates the skills and techniques of Lacrosse. This film looks at the techniques of scooping the ball, and shows scooping drills.

results.title: Hjorundfjord
results.brief_description: Shows the life and tourist activities in the fjord. Scenes show the harvest on land and salmon fishing from motor boats. Commercial salmon fishing has been the activity of some families for generations. A wedding couple crosses the fjord in a boat to the strains of the Hardanger eight-stringed fiddle and tourists are seen hiking, boating and mountain climbing around the fjord.
results.description: Shows the life and tourist activities in the fjord. Scenes show the harvest on land and salmon fishing from motor boats. Commercial salmon fishing has been the activity of some families for generations. A wedding couple crosses the fjord in a boat to the strains of the Hardanger eight-stringed fiddle and tourists are seen hiking, boating and mountain climbing around the fjord.

results.title: Hitch hiker
results.creator_credit: Gerald Varney, Polly Turner and CPC Productions
results.brief_description: Young hitchhikers are interviewed and we hear their philosophy regarding hitchhiking. We hear their poetry, see them camping amid spectacular scenery and meet the people who are willing to pick them up. This activity is seen as a rebellion to parental authority and a statement of individualism.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gerald Varney, Polly Turner and CPC Productions
